title: Add generated favicon asset and ensure correct HTML favicon reference

requirements.summary: Add the generated favicon PNG to the frontend public generated assets so it is served instead of the default tab icon.
acceptanceCriteria: A file named subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/ in the built output.
Requesting /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png in the browser returns HTTP 200 (not 404).
After a hard refresh, the browser tab displays the custom favicon (not the default icon).

file_operations.description: Add the missing generated favicon asset file exactly at frontend/public/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png so it is included in the build and can be fetched at /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png.

requirements.summary: Verify and, if necessary, update frontend/index.html to reference the exact favicon path/filename without any overriding favicon links.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html contains a <link rel='icon'> (or equivalent) that points to /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png with sizes='32x32' and type='image/png'.
No other favicon link in frontend/index.html overrides this reference.

file_operations.description: Ensure there is exactly one effective favicon reference pointing to /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png with type='image/png' and sizes='32x32', and remove/adjust any other favicon-related tags only if they override this reference.
